idea-plugin.name: Helsing
idea-plugin.description:
Dark color theme for working under the sunlight. It is designed to be visible even in enormously bright environment. Here are some tips for working on plain air.
  1. Wear dark. Your screen will reflect your bright clothes. Even a matte display won't help if the sun will be shining on your white T-shirt.
  2. Try to find a shadow.
  3. Set the brightness level to the maximum.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Color updates for JavaScript, C++, Razor Pages and regular expressions
